name: LD39 - Static Man
description:
This is a survive the night style game created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39. The theme was 'Running out of Power'.

A malicious entity is roaming your house looking to kill you, it can only be slowed down with light, your only hope is to survive until dawn by feeding every piece of fuel you can find into the furnace to keep the lights on and keep the monster at bay!

Controls:
WASD - Move around
Mouse - Look around
E - Interact
Mouse button - Use item

[Issues: Collision with the axe is a little bit finicky with some
objects, mostly tables and wooden doors, if you aren’t getting the hit
(there will be a sound) then try stepping away a bit or facing more up
or down. Every difficulty is possible, but I recommend playing on Normal.]

[Tips: The keys might cause confusion - ideally they would have been colour coded. The "store key" unlocks the door in the corridor, the "kitchen key" unlocks the two doors between the furnace and the kitchen, the two front doors only open at dawn.  Finding the key, getting the axe, and smashing up everything made of wood to stick in the fire, is the way to survive. Wood gives more fuel than paper - but paper can be picked up before you have the axe: paintings and books.]

Ludum Dare page - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/static-man
